title: Create Digital Ad Campaign for a Rivalry Game
description: A team's marketing department wants to run a targeted digital ad campaign to boost ticket sales for an upcoming rivalry game.

tasks.description: Define the target audience for the ad campaign (e.g., past ticket buyers, fans living within a 50-mile radius).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a specific audience segment for the campaign.

tasks.description: Create the ad copy and visuals for the campaign.
Launch the ad campaign on social media and search platforms, with a set budget.
Monitor the campaign's performance, tracking click-through rate and ticket sales.
